articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.title: Anthropic launches a Claude AI agent that lives in Chrome - TechCrunch
articles.description: Anthropic is the latest AI lab to offer an AI agent with the ability to view and take action in a user's Chrome browser.
articles.content: Anthropic is launching a research preview of a browser-based AI agent powered by its Claude AI models, the company announced on Tuesday. The agent, Claude for Chrome, is rolling out to a group of 1,0… [+3115 chars]
